TopicTitle: No Navball in Near Future Spacecraft Pod

Articles.Content:
Hi there!

Probably this is a problem someone had probably posted a solution earlier, but I cannot find one. So I am asking for help on this way. I am playing with some Mods including Rasterpropmonitor and Near Future Spacecraft Parts. The screens in the Pod work correct, except the Navball, it shows only it's frame and is therefore of no use. What can I do?

Thanks for reading & helping

MoarDV and Diddly Feelerino worked together to create a configuration fix for the Near Future Spacaecraft two-man pod in the Near Future Spaceraft thread, back here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-1-04-Near-Future-Technologies-(04-09-15-bugfix-for-NFE)/page495?p=2183145#post2183145

Based on that, I threw together a Modulemanager .cfg that works for me, which you can find here:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/4057920/KSP%20Shipshare/notovny_NFS.cfg

Since it's based on that post, though, it only fixes the Navball for the large forward screens.
Thanks so much! Now it works with no problem! And thanks for the quick reply! Fly safe!
